resources.string: Draw your pattern again to confirm. Please remember this pattern. If you forget it, you\'ll need to perform a factory reset on this device.
Patterns do not match. Please try again.
You can secure your account on this device by setting an unlock pattern. You\'ll need to draw this pattern each time you want to access your account on this device.
